title.narrative: Activity 4.4: Conduct participatory mapping and planning activities with women for income generation, economic empowerment and livelihood opportunities for communities, including through appropriate and relevant humanitarian partners, and support women to access those opportunities in order to contribute to greater sustainability of WPT activities.
